dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Illegal File Sharing]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, November 13, 2005 3:58 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; jenifer@bondware.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Illegal File Sharing]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Illegal File Sharing
Date:         Fri, 11 Nov 2005 17:07:49 -0600
From:         JC <jenifer@bondware.com>
To:         <legal@theplanet.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         copyrights@renderosity.com



Below is a list of threads where one of your hosting customers is illegally
redistributing Renderosity Files that are copyright protected.  Please
remove the threads listed as soon as possible, and hopefully even remove his
site.

This member has been banned from site for illegal distribution and since you
see from the list below he is very extreme in illegal distribution, I ask
that you please also ban him from using your service as well.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this urgent matter.

Best Regards,
Jenifer Carey
Renderosity Admin &
Copyright Agent
www.renderosity.com <http://www.renderosity.com>
